about.title: About Me
about.name: Ahmed Lotfy
about.description1: I am a Senior Full-Stack Engineer focused on solving business problems. I specialize in the modern React ecosystem (Next.js, TypeScript) but I place equal emphasis on ROI, performance metrics, and system reliability.
about.description2: My path to software engineering is rooted in a deep background in hardware and IT systems. This allows me to architect solutions that are not just code, but robust infrastructure.
about.description3: I partner with businesses to build software that drives revenue, reduces costs, and scales effortlessly. I am currently accepting new clients for high-impact projects.
